name: weakened
contents:
In the Weakened state, creatures suffer:
- Disadvantage to Strength rolls
- 50% penalty to damage from Strength attacks
- Encumbrance TBD (if that's ever implemented)
bodyHtml:
In the Weakened state, creatures suffer:

  • Disadvantage to Strength rolls
  • 50% penalty to damage from Strength attacks
  • Encumbrance TBD (if that's ever implemented)
